item.title: Email sent to Lindy C. Ransom, Office Management Specialist at the U.S. Embassy in Beijing
item.description: Click on this link to visualize the original email: 2024-03-09_2058_0800_email_to_lindy_ransom_us_embassy_Redacted.pdf From: Vincent B. Le Corre Subject: FW: My call to the U.S. Embassy Legal Attaché Office Date sent: March 09, 2024, 20:58 +0800 (China Standard Time) To: Lindy C. Ransom (OMS at the U.S. Embassy, Beijing, China) Cc: Nicholas Burns (U.S. Ambassador) Dear Ms. Ransom, I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to bring to your attention a matter of importance regarding the communications I have been sending to Ambassador Burns.
